name: Bayesian Modelling of WTA Matches
desc: Ranking WTA players by using a Bayesian logistic model fit using a Monte Carlo Markov Chain (MCMC).

name: NFL Down Outcome Prediction
desc: A neural network framework to model the underlying markov chain process in NFL down outcomes.

name: Text to Speech Tool with My Voice
desc: Add custom text in the the linked google colab sheet and generate speech from my voice model. Inferences are served by a flask API using Tacotron2 and Univnet models to produce speech from text.

name: Voice Cloning with Tacotron2
desc: A scaleable approach to cloning voices using Tacotron2 and Univnet or WaveGlow model architectures.

name: Marketplace Pricing Reco. Engine
desc: Deployed models that make marketplace pricing personalized, seamless, and intelligent. Complete the form to get a recommended budget and see how many responses you can expect to receive.

name: Analytics for Working Professionals
desc: Developed and presented a 4-session course to improve organizational productivity by cultivating analytical fluency.

name: Globalization of the Voice Over Gig Economy
desc: Analysis of the interactions between voice talent and clients across the globe using Tableau.
